column7: Age range (young 0-1 yrs, young adult 1-3 yrs, adult 3-8 yrs, senior 8+ yrs)
column18: Intro
Hello, Iâ€™m Noodle! I am a young, boisterous, happy, and GROWING boy! I am looking for a home that has extensive large breed experience.
Hello, I'm Brandy! I love extreme fetch, puzzle toys, and hide and seek.
Hello, I'm Quincy! I love any and all toys and a good game of chase or tug of war.
Hello, I'm Cash! I love food - my favourites are chicken and pepperoni!
Hello, I'm Roxie! My favourite thing to do is snuggle up with other dogs.
Hello, I'm Stella! I love to run, play with ropes, and jump around with other dogs.
Hello, I'm Jojo! The key to my heart is peanut butter <3
Hello, I'm Sugar! I love playing with my toy mouse and chasing laser pointers. I'm bonded with Ginger.
Hello, I'm Ginger! I love cuddling and scratches. I'm bonded with my brother, Sugar.
Hello, I'm Thatcher! I love being pets and scritches, and loud noises sometimes spook me.
Hello, I'm Charli! I'm very affectionate and love cuddling!
Hello, I'm Toffee! Like my name suggests, I'm very sweet!
Hello, I'm Verstappen! I love playing with other cats and would love a friendly feline companion!
Hello, I'm Spudmier! I love learning to play fetch with crinkle toys.
Hello, I'm Freckles! I love snuggling and burrowing into a nest made of pillows.
Hello, I'm Katana! I love chin scratches and I'm bonded with Shield.
Hello, I'm Shield! I love chin scratches and I'm bonded with Katana.
Hello, I'm Nailah! I love sitting on top of the cat tree! I'm bonded with Jamilia.
Hello, I'm Jamilia! I love to chase after balls and laser pointers! I'm bonded with Nailah.
Hello, I'm Creampuff! Fun fact - I have 6 toes on each paw!
Hello, I'm Tony! I love singing and flying around in my enclosure! I'm bonded with Mark.
Hello, I'm Mark! I love singing and flying around in my enclosure! I'm bonded with Tony.
Hello, I'm Huffles! I love snuggles and toys!
Hello, I'm Venom! I love to roam and explore, and I'm okay with having other female guinea pigs around.
Hello, I'm Sue Ann Nivens! I love eating tasty treats and I am bonded with Rose.
Hello, I'm Daisy Mae! I love slow head and chin scratches.
